personal.name: Marina Olivella
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer
personal.summary: Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable, impactful systems across climate tech and fintech. Combines deep technical proficiency with strong collaboration and project leadership skills. Proven success in improving team processes, enhancing documentation, and delivering reliable, maintainable software at scale.
personal.summaryExtended: Equally comfortable architecting backend systems or creating polished, accessible front-end experiences using React, TypeScript, Node.js, and AWS. Passionate about using technology to drive social and environmental impact and continuously improving how teams deliver meaningful digital products. Committed to innovation, experimentation, and thoughtful engineering that serves real human needs.

achievements.headline: Re-architected a monolithic GHG (Greenhouse Gas) Inventory system into a modular app store platform
achievements.description: Transformed the GHG Inventory into one of several reusable, plug-and-play apps, enabling multiple independent applications to be developed and integrated within the web application. Established a scalable application framework for future expansion.

achievements.headline: Created a core components library using Figma's MCP
achievements.description: Created a core components library using Figma's MCP, enabling the creation of reusable components for the web application. This library is used by the entire team to create new features and applications.

achievements.headline: Developed a React proof-of-concept (PoC) template leveraging the company's frontend components library
achievements.description: Created a library of core components to be used in the development of PoCs, ensuring consistency across teams. Successfully delivered a production-grade PoC using the new template, improving turnaround time for experimental feature development.

achievements.headline: Integrated LLM APIs in synchronous and asynchronous manners
achievements.description: Consumed and integrated LLM APIs into the HIAP Platform backend. Implemented both synchronous and asynchronous LLM service calls for real-time climate action prioritization and action plan generation. Designed data storage strategies to persist LLM responses in databases for cached access.

achievements.headline: Resolved critical race condition in credit card payment processing system
achievements.description: Encountered and resolved a critical race condition in the credit card payment processing system. Developed proof-of-concepts using Kinesis and AWS SQS FIFO to mitigate the issue and implemented the chosen solution, enhancing system reliability and establishing a best practice company-wide.

achievements.headline: Implemented innovative solution utilizing OpenSearch aliases for zero-downtime index updates
achievements.description: Utilized runtime configuration settings, facilitated by AWS Systems Manager, to add new fields to OpenSearch indices without downtime. Successfully modified 50 million documents, ensuring compliance with SLA agreements and minimizing costs. , ElastiCache, AppConfig, SSM, Lambda, CloudFormation, SQS, EC2, Cloudwatch, CodePipeline, Secrets Manager, Eventbridge, Kinesis, OpenSearch

achievements.headline: Led the integration of a new product line within the existing codebase
achievements.description: Focused on introducing reusable components and automation to ensure seamless integration while maintaining code quality and production stability.

achievements.headline: Created comprehensive onboarding documentation
achievements.description: Created a day's worth of onboarding company that a dozen team members used on their first week, including the new CTO.

achievements.headline: Identified and addressed performance bottlenecks in database queries
achievements.description: Conducted extensive code refactoring and restructuring, resulting in improved system performance and reduced operational costs.

achievements.headline: Built Learning Management System from scratch
achievements.description: Our team was tasked with building a Learning Management System from scratch. I designed the database structure, implemented functionalities such as test taking and live webinars. We used Firebase for authentication, database and cloud functions and Twilio for video sessions.

achievements.headline: Led and trained a team of developers
achievements.description: Ensured adherence to best practices and fostered collaboration on solution designs.

achievements.headline: Contributed to product meetings with functional analysis
achievements.description: Provided functional analysis and proposed innovative solutions.

achievements.headline: Led codebase refactor for international expansion
achievements.description: Refactored codebase to support international expansion.

achievements.headline: Development and maintenance of Java + Javascript codebase
achievements.description: Maintained and developed features for the existing codebase.

achievements.headline: Implemented Byzantine-Fault tolerant consensus algorithm
achievements.description: Implemented a Byzantine-Fault tolerant consensus algorithm for an upcoming cryptocurrency (unreleased).

achievements.headline: Development and maintenance of systems
achievements.description: Development and maintenance of systems in Java, PL/SQL.
